page.title: 05OUR SCHOOL TRIP
page.content: Each year we all go on a trip.This year we went on a coach to Bekonscot Model Village and the Courage Shire Horse Centre near Maidenhead. At the Model Village we saw lots of old houses and shops.One was Marks and Spencer, that brought a laugh.There was a lake with a pier and a water wheel.Railways ran all round the village. Next we went to the Shire Horse Centre.We were introduced to all the horses in turn.Barley was a popular horse she has appeared on T.V. and films.We watched a farrier shoeing Barley.One horse refuses to be shod so cannot work yet.Each working horse weighs about 1 ton and can pull 2 tons.Sometimes 4 horses pull 8 tons of Courage beer.
